duties_responsibilities.duty: Improve the quality and consistency of customer communications and meet customer's expectations.
Enhance branch productivity through effective work scheduling and planning.
Contribute to cost containment through effective inventory planning and warranty.
Effectively handle all incoming shop calls and perform clerical duties within the shop operations.
Create repair orders for technicians and make recommendations on min-max levels to the inventory planning team.

Coordinate customer interface, issue resolution, and customer satisfaction, and execute customer communication protocol as it pertains to PM scheduling and follow up, breakdowns, and vehicle status updates.
